default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: Name's Ermes Costello. Got caught robbing a convenience store. Since it’s not my first offense... I’m doing real time.

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: Once you get the hang of this power, it’s actually pretty damn handy.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: Still think you can run? That chance is long gone.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: Get back! Run as far as you can!

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: Everyone hates Mondays, but we push through ‘cause we know Saturday’s coming. Life isn’t just Mondays, right?

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: Revenge—it's how I bring closure to my fate.

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: Some people will preach at me—say revenge won’t bring my sister back. That forgiveness is the answer. But if you ask me to forget the one I lost... to walk away like nothing happened... that ain’t a life I want. I’ve made up my mind since the start.

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: I don’t know why, but the tears just started flowing. Honestly... I wanted to come cry in your arms. But maybe... maybe there’s no time left for tears.

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: You’ve seriously got a screw loose, you know that?

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Hey! What the hell are you doing!?
